segments.text: I want to change rooms . In fact , I want a refund for tonight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you tell me the exact problem , I can be more helpful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cockroaches have declared war on my room !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Allow me to apologize . I'll give you another room right now , and a full refund for tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for not asking me to collect the roaches in a jar as evidence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , only your mother wants to please you more than we do .
segments.speaker: S2
